source.description: Official solver script used as ground truth (no solve.md present).

points.description: Extract `encrypted_flag` and `key_bytes` arrays from the assembly/solver.
XOR corresponding bytes to recover the plaintext flag.
points.evidence: src/solve.py computes `''.join(chr(e ^ k) for e, k in zip(...))`.

evaluation.notes: The writeup matches the XOR-based decryption exactly.
